html:
- the user is responsible for his content : 

« You shall be solely responsible for your own Content and the consequences of submitting and publishing your Content on the Service. »

« You are solely responsible for the activity that occurs on your account, and you must keep your account password secure. »

- youtube is not responsible when there is unauthorized access to the account but the user is responsible toward Youtube if a unauthorized access causes loss to youtube : 

« Although YouTube will not be liable for your losses caused by any unauthorized use of your account, you may be liable for the losses of YouTube or others due to such unauthorized use. »

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: governance on youtube
text:
- the user is responsible for his content :

« You shall be solely responsible for your own Content and the consequences
of submitting and publishing your Content on the Service. »

« You are solely responsible for the activity that occurs on your account,
and you must keep your account password secure. »
- youtube is not responsible when there is unauthorized access to the
account but the user is responsible toward Youtube if a unauthorized access
causes loss to youtube :

« Although YouTube will not be liable for your losses caused by any
unauthorized use of your account, you may be liable for the losses of
YouTube or others due to such unauthorized use. »

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
